description.summary: documentation for the testing framework Caius
description.p: Caius is a functional testing framework for the 21st century. It was born out of the need for a contemporary replacement for DejaGnu.

Caius is written in object-oriented Tcl and provides easy-to-use programming interfaces to proven testing technologies. Through its versatile reporting system, Caius integrates well with modern CI systems and test management tools.
This package contains man pages and documentation in HTML format.
